segments.text: The doctor sent me over here to have my blood drawn .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly , please have a seat and roll up your left sleeve .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , today your doctor wants us to check your white blood cell count .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , if it is elevated , you might have an infection .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is only a little pin stick . I am going to put a tourniquet on your arm to puff your veins up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There we go ! I got the blood that I needed .
segments.speaker: S2
